page.title: 08HIGHER KEHELLAND FARM 2
page.content: At the time of our visit,most of the other fields were being used to grow barley,potatoes and peas. Spring and winter barley are grown and used mainly for animal feed.Several varieties of potato are grown, including "Record" which are used to produce potato crisps. They are particularly suitable for this because they do not blacken when fried. The peas being grown are used to make dog food but,being high in protein,could also be used to help solve food shortages in Thirld World countries. Oil seed rape is also grown,which is used for cooking oil and animal feed, and may, in the future help out as a source of energy. The crops in these fields are rotated and another large field is used as a seed bed for the other crops grown. In this field were vast numbers of plants.
